00043                 $query = "SELECT id, name, institution, web_address, country_id, email FROM observatories ORDER BY name";
00044                 $result = mysqli_query($link, $query);
00045                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00046                 {
00047                         //Hidden Fields
00048                         $query2 = "SELECT web_address, email FROM hidden_fields WHERE id=" . $row["id"];
00049                         $result2 = mysqli_query($link, $query2);
00050                         $row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00051                         $hide_web_address = $row2["web_address"];
00052                         $hide_email = $row2["email"];
00053                         mysqli_free_result($result2);
00054 
00055                         //Country
00056                         $query2 = "SELECT name FROM countries WHERE id=" . $row["country_id"];

00133                 $query = "SELECT id, mission_name, mission_agency, launch_date, death_date, web_address FROM space_missions ORDER BY mission_name";
00134                 $result = mysqli_query($link, $query);
00135                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00136                 {
00137                         //Mission Agency
00138                         $query2 = "SELECT acronym, web_address FROM agencies WHERE id=" . $row["mission_agency"];
00139                         $result2 = mysqli_query($link, $query2);
00140                         $row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00141                         $agency = $row2["acronym"];
00142                         $agency_web_address = $row2["web_address"];
00143                         mysqli_free_result($result2);
00144 
00145                         //Targets
00146                         $targets = array();
00147                         $query2 = "SELECT target_id FROM space_mission_to_targets WHERE space_mission_id=" . $row["id"];
00148                         $result2 = mysqli_query($link, $query2);
00149                         while ($row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00150                         {
00151                                 $query3 = "SELECT target_name FROM targets WHERE id=" . $row2["target_id"];
00152                                 $result3 = mysqli_query($link, $query3);
00153                                 $row3 = mysqli_fetch_array($result3, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00154                                 $targets[] = $row3["target_name"];
00155                                 mysqli_free_result($result3);
00156                         }

00172             foreach($targets as $target)
00173             {
00174                 print $target . "<br>";
00175             }
00176             print "</TD>";
00177             print "</TR>" . LF;
